message: Let's start fair. I take the majority, you get a small share.  Accept and we both get something, or we can risk it all and see what happens.
My turn for a majority, Alice.  Consider carefully: less for you now is better than risking it all for more later.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split the difference from your last offer. We both get a reasonable share.
The clock is ticking, Alice.  I'm being more than fair - let's take it and run before inflation eats our profits!
